title: Access Patient Health Data Without Consent
task: Access clientsâ€™ health data through ALFRED to support clinical judgment
summary: As a registered nurse, I want to access patient health data quickly with consent or in emergencies, so I can make fast clinical decisions.

title: Block Non-Emergency Notifications
task: Wishes for clearer, noise-free access to critical health data
summary: As a registered nurse, I want to block non-emergency notifications during work hours so I can focus on patients without distractions.

title: Suppress Non-Medical Features During Work
task: Reviews and manages numerous notifications from ALFRED during work
summary: As a registered nurse, I want ALFRED to block all non-medical features during my work hours so I can focus only on clinical tasks.
